meanings.definition: To cause to curve or become curved
meanings.sent1: She bends the wire to make a circle.
meanings.sent2: He bends down to tie his shoelaces.
meanings.sent3: The tree bends gracefully in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Time bends our memories like a river reshaping its course.
meanings.sent5: The artist bends the light to create beautiful shadows.

meanings.definition: A curved or angular deviation from a straight line
meanings.sent1: The road has many sharp bends.
meanings.sent2: The river flows around a bend in the valley.
meanings.sent3: The bend in the path led to a hidden garden.
meanings.sent4: The bend of her smile brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The bend of the mountain obscured the view beyond.

meanings.definition: A force that causes something to curve
meanings.sent1: The strong wind creates a bend in the flagpole.
meanings.sent2: The weight of the book creates a bend in the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The bend of the magnet pulls the metal closer.
meanings.sent4: Love is the invisible bend that draws hearts together.
meanings.sent5: The bend of gravity keeps the planets in orbit.
